metadata.description:
I've been reflecting on my journey and what I want moving forward. I want to continue to evolve and create, and I'm excited to bring my community along for the ride over the next 6 months.

While I create my next album, I also want to revolutionize what it means to be in an artist's community in Web3. Each month, I'll be innovating and pushing the boundaries of what an artist can deliver to their community beyond just music

I'll be releasing what I'm dubbing a 2-pack NFT drop, consisting of 2 songs that have a shared resonance, message, vibe, etc. One track from each 2-pack will end up on the album, but you won't know which one until it's completed.

But that's not all! Each 2-pack NFT drop will also include custom-designed merch that will be available to holders of the NFT (more info to be announced this week). This is an exclusive opportunity for my community to get their hands on limited edition CHILDLIKE items.

Additionally, each monthly 2-pack activation will be coupled with additional audio, visual, BTS, and IRL opportunities. Each month will bring new music, new aesthetics, and new rewards.

My community will get the inside scoop into my process as I build my next album, and I'll be pushing the boundaries of what it means to be an artist in Web3.

Super excited to see where this journey takes me. Thank you to my friends and collectors in Web3 for reigniting my passion for growing artistically, and I can't wait to see where we go from here.

We are Off The Shrooms & this is what we hear prior to the transition, the prelude!

lyrics.text:
OFF THE SHROOMS 

we’re gonna go to the moon

I drank a little too much juice, hey 
now I’m on my way to the moon 

mad as fuck 
much time wasted
a bad ass bitch 
for me is contagious 
I cut her off quick 
for pure entertainment 
i'm low key lit
I flew her private
i just got rich 
ain’t have no guidance
I cash one check
then blow it on the next high
i don’t een flex
i figure I’m the best guy 

there’s no more principles hey
all these subliminals hey 
I’m so gone
lost my remote
no control 

my friends are criminals hey
done the unthinkable hey
I’m so gone

we’re gonna go to the moon
I’m high as hell off the shrooms
I drank a little too much juice, hey 
and now I’m on my way to the moon

she off that white
remind me of whitney 
we just had sex
the pussy uplift me
the way i hit
it’s hard to forget me

I don’t do drugs
where did I go blind
and now i need a hug 
cuz i'm off my shit
I’m with a couple thugs
but i don’t flip bricks
I’m way too loving 
hey hey hey hey
